sect1.title: General
sect1.para: The DWA Sensor Sirene (DWAX) component receives a master code from DWA component in order to arm the Siren. DWA Sensor Sirene is notified by DWA which sends an arm request with MasterCode. If MasterCode is already generated and read correctly from NvM, the signal containing the generated MasterCode will be passed to DWA Sensor Sirene to properly perform arming. When MasterCode is not available nor properly generated we start generating MasterCode procedure.
